Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Jackson, LaSalle, Monroe and Dearborn, SB: Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Dearborn due to police activity near Jackson/Dearborn.

Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Lasalle, Monroe and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to  track conditions at Jackson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line subway trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Cermak and Fullerton due to  track conditions at Jackson.

Shuttle buses are now available from State/Lake to Fullerton to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Train service to Howard

After stopping at Cermak-Chinatown, Howard-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Armitage (accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Fullerton and make all normal stops to Howard.

Connections can be made between 95th/Dan Ryan-bound subway service and Howard-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at State/Lake (transfer to nearby elevated station, board on Brown Line side) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

95th/Dan Ryan-bound service is not affected.
